__e: Standing in front of you is like looking in a mirror.
You know, I copped to what I did right away, and-and now I'm lookin' forward, man.
Wherever there's trouble, I look around, and there you are.
I sit back and I look at the last 20 years, and I think I've had the best time ever.
I'm looking at a future with somebody who doesn't believe in marriage or in having children.
Okay, I know it's hard for you, but could you maybe not make yourself the center of attention right now?
And the look I saw on the faces of my command I'll remember until my dying day.
Because I look into depths you can't even imagine, since I am a man and you?
Then tender looks, then bashful ones, then...
I will not look back... because then they will know what I am thinking.
You do not look back because you know that no matter what you need, whenever you need it, I will, alive or dead, be there for you.
